name: A Tribes Ritual
description:
"Upon my divination I have received the whispering words from our guardian deity. For this next cycles ritual, I have received the name of the choosen Child.

 Honored with this duty is Little Raven!"

A ritual to ask the guardian deity for another three years of prosperity, and for this you have to gather a few materials. Help the other native americans through completing their quests and in exchange get what you need.

Take your time as there are no harms. But most importantly have fun!

If you are interested in playing the game hit the download button, unpack the files and enjoy it. This Game was made solo over the course of about six months.
